original_text: “At that time the kingdom of heaven will be like ten virgins who took their lamps and went out to meet the bridegroom.
korean_text: 그 때에 천국은 마치 등을 들고 신랑을 맞으러 나간 열 처녀와 같다 하리니

sentences.original_text: the kingdom of heaven will be like
ten virgins who took their lamps
and went out to meet the bridegroom
